title: Search results not selected in external jar
description: Bug 7945 Search results not selected in external jar Build 200201151. Search for references to this field.
OB: When searching for references to the field in the external jar, no results are selected.
EB: When searching for references to this field in the external jar, you should get 3 matches in the method getTempDir().
SR:
1. Open the external jar in the IDE.
2. Open the class containing the field.
3. Perform a search for references to this field.
4. Observe that no results are selected when the search is completed.
